hero.title: full-featured password security
hero.description: Built with ❤️ to simplify your online life.

cards.title: save passwords with a click
cards.description: PSM prompts you to save your passwords every time you log in to a new website or create a new online account and remembers them for later use.

cards.title: login automatically
cards.description: Want to log in to your favorite accounts? No need to enter your login credentials — PSM does it for you.

cards.title: easily import your passwords
cards.description: PSM automatically detects passwords stored in your browsers. Import them instantly or upload a CSV file.

cards.title: access passwords from a browser
cards.description: Add the PSM browser extension to enable the autosave and autofill features. The extension is available on Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Edge, Chrome, Opera, and Safari.

cards.title: sync passwords across all your devices
cards.description: PSM automatically syncs your passwords across computers, tablets, or phones. The PSM app is currently available on Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and IOS.

cards.title: web vault access
cards.description: The PSM Web Vault offers most of the features and functionalities available on our desktop app — you don’t have to install the application on your device.

cards.title: store unlimited passwords and passkeys
cards.description: PSM has no storage limits. Securely store as many passwords and passkeys as you want in a single place. Access them all whenever you need them.

cards.title: store files alongside passwords
cards.description: Effortlessly attach files to your existing items and have the most important documents with you at all times.

cards.title: note down things that matter
cards.description: Secure Notes are ideal for securing things like Wi-Fi passwords, alarm system codes, and other important information that you want to keep absolutely safe.

cards.title: have secure access to your credit cards
cards.description: Securely store your credit cards and fill in their details on the go when shopping online. Scan them with a built-in OCR scanner — no manual typing needed.

cards.title: save and autofill Personal info
cards.description: Add your name, email address, phone number, and work or home address in the Personal Info tab and autofill tedious online forms with just a few clicks.

cards.title: organize everything into folders
cards.description: Organize your passwords, passkeys, credit cards, and secure notes into folders for quick and easy access.

cards.title: check for leaked data
cards.description: Discover whether any of your sensitive data has been leaked and fortify the security of any potentially compromised accounts immediately.

cards.title: identify vulnerable passwords
cards.description: The Password Health tool is purpose-built to identify weak, old, and reused passwords.

cards.title: share passwords and passkeys securely
cards.description: Securely share passwords and passkeys with other PSM users over an encrypted channel and grant full or limited access depending on your needs.

cards.title: emergency access
cards.description: In case of emergency provide family members or close friends with access to your passwords and secure notes stored in your PSM vault.

cards.title: generate complex passwords
cards.description: Protect your accounts from intruders by generating complex and unique passwords with the Password Generator.

cards.title: add an extra layer of security to your PSMvault
cards.description: Set up Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), add an OTP generator, or use a bluetooth device or a USB stick as an extra layer of security for your PSM vault.

cards.title: protected by XChaCha20 encryption
cards.description: Passwords and other sensitive data you store in PSM are automatically encrypted with the XChaCha20 encryption algorithm to ensure complete security.

cards.title: secure your account with biometrics
cards.description: The strongest password you’ve got is you. Unlock your password vault using your face or fingerprint. Easier for you to log in — harder for bad actors to crack.

cards.title: your passwords and passkeys are only yours
cards.description: PSM uses zero-knowledge architecture, which means that no one else but you can see what’s in your encrypted vault.

title.text: start managing your passwords easier, faster and safer

questions.question: Why is PSM better than a built-in browser password solution?
questions.answer:
PSM has significantly better security than your average built-in browser password solution. PSM uses advanced encryption algorithms to ensure the security of your password vault and offers multi-factor authentication for complete security.
Additionally, with PSM Premium, you can take advantage of advanced security features such as Password Health, Data Breach Scanner, and Secure Item Sharing. With Password Health, you can detect weak, reused, or old passwords, while Data Breach Scanner allows you to find out whether any of your sensitive data has appeared in a data leak. Finally, Secure Item Sharing allows you to safely share your passwords as well as other sensitive information with other PSM users.

questions.question: Is PSM Safe?
questions.answer: Yes. PSM employs top-tier encryption, automatic back-ups, and multi-factor authentication to ensure that everything you store in your encrypted vault is protected at all times. PSM has successfully undergone an independent security audit by Cure53, a well respected third-party auditor. The audit focused on our cryptographic premise, source code, the PSM background application, and its codebase.

questions.question: How to use PSM?
questions.answer: The PSM application is available for mobile and desktop devices. It is compatible with most popular operating systems such as Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS.

questions.question: What is PSM?
questions.answer: PSM is a secure, easy-to-use password manager purpose-built for a smoother and safer online experience. Besides your login credentials, you can also use PSM to securely store and access your credit card details, secure notes, and personal information. Everything you keep in PSM is protected by advanced encryption algorithms.

questions.question: What is PSM Premium?
questions.answer: PSM Premium is a subscription plan that allows you to stay logged in to PSM on up to 6 different devices and securely share passwords with other PSM users. You also get access to Premium features such as Data Breach Scanner, Password Health, and Secure Item Sharing.

questions.question: Does PSM work offline?
questions.answer: Yes, you can use PSM to access your passwords, credit card details, secure notes, and personal information even when you're offline. You can also use PSM on up to 6 different devices, including a desktop computer, laptop, tablet, or mobile device.

questions.question: Where does PSM store passwords?
questions.answer: PSM stores all your passwords, passkeys, credit cards, secure notes, and other sensitive information in the cloud to make sure you don’t lose access to them, even if you lose the device that has the PSM application installed on it. However, it is important to note that PSM encrypts all your sensitive data before it is uploaded to the cloud. This ensures the complete security of all the data that you store in the PSM vault.
